thread.title: Highly recommend We'll be back!
thread.title_full: Highly recommend We'll be back! - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Elvin D
title: Highly recommend We'll be back!
text:
Spectacular view of the city, friendly stuff, amazing room service, fast elevators, new building, clean rooms, very comfortable bed. This hotel is really stunning!!!
Next to Rector Station with direct access in every spot of the City plus so many attractions around the building!
Thank you so much for the hospitality and amazing accommodation! We'll be back soon!
Room Tip: As higher as better. Amazing view from the top level rooms. See more room tips
